title: KitchedAid 5 (more then 20 color variants, capacity 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in single batch, 59 touch points planetary mixing, includes: Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield)
descriptions:
**Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer – Your Ultimate Kitchen Companion**

Unleash your culinary creativity with the exceptional KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, a must-have for any kitchen enthusiast. Designed with both aesthetics and functionality in mind, this mixer is not only a statement piece for your countertop but also a versatile tool for all your mixing needs.

**Product Features:**

- **Color Options:** Choose from more than 20 vibrant color variants to match your kitchen decor or express your personal style.
- **Generous Capacity:** Effortlessly prepare 9 dozen cookies or knead dough for 4 loaves of bread in a single batch.
- **Innovative Mixing Action:** Experience thorough ingredient incorporation with the 59 touch points planetary mixing action, ensuring perfectly mixed batters and dough every time.
- **Premium Construction:** Built to last with a sturdy metal frame that can take on any mixing challenge.
- **Tilt-Head Design:** Easily access the bowl and attachments with the convenient tilt-head design.
- **Variable Speed Control:** Precisely control your mixing with 10 speed settings, suitable for a wide range of recipes.
- **5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl:** The ample-sized bowl comes with a comfortable handle and is dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
- **Versatile Attachments Included:** This model includes a 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, and Pouring Shield to kickstart your baking and cooking adventures.
- **Expand Your Culinary Arsenal:** More than 10 optional hub-powered attachments are available for purchase, transforming your stand mixer into a culinary center.
- **Model Details:** The KitchenAid 5 is known for its model number KSM150PS, indicating its high-quality design and performance.

Whether you're a seasoned baker or just starting out, the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is the perfect tool to help you mix, knead, and whip your way to delicious creations. With its robust construction, versatile attachments, and ease of use, the KitchenAid 5 is truly the heart of your kitchen.

**Order now and elevate your baking and cooking experience with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer!**

**KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer: The Ultimate Kitchen Companion**

Transform your baking and cooking experience with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, a versatile and powerful tool designed to meet all your mixing needs. With its robust metal construction and a stylish tilt-head design, this mixer is not only a countertop statement but a culinary essential for both novice and experienced chefs.

**Product Features:**
- **Color Options:** Choose from over 20 vibrant color variants to match your kitchen decor or personal style.
- **Capacity:** Effortlessly mix up to 9 dozen cookies or knead dough for 4 bread loaves in a single batch.
- **Mixing Excellence:** Achieve thorough blending with a 59 touch points planetary mixing action, ensuring every ingredient is perfectly incorporated.
- **Speed Control:** Customize your mixing with 10 speed settings to handle any recipe, from slow stir to fast whip.
- **Bowl Quality:** A 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl with a comfortable handle offers ample capacity and convenience, and it's dishwasher safe for easy cleanup.
- **Attachments Included:** Comes with a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield to make your prep work simpler and more efficient.
- **Expand Your Creativity:** Over 10 optional hub-powered attachments available (sold separately), turning your mixer into a culinary center.
- **Model Details:** The package includes the model KSM150PS, known for its reliability and performance.

Whether you're a baking enthusiast or a professional chef, the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is the perfect addition to your kitchen arsenal. With its exceptional mixing capabilities, a wide range of color options, and multiple attachments, it is engineered to help create everything from pasta to ice cream, sausages to salsa, and so much more. 

Embrace the joy of cooking with KitchenAid and make the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer the heart of your kitchen today!

**KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer with Tilt-Head Design**

Unleash your culinary creativity with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer, a versatile and powerful ally in your kitchen. Equipped with a robust metal construction and a stylish tilt-head design, this mixer is not only a statement piece available in over 20 color variants but also an essential tool for any baking enthusiast.

**Key Features:**

- **High-Capacity Mixing**: Effortlessly mix up to 9 dozen cookies or knead dough for 4 loaves of bread in a single batch. Cookie dough enthusiasts will appreciate the ability to mix 28g of cookie dough per piece with ease.
- **Planetary Mixing Action**: Boasting 59 touch points per rotation, the mixer ensures thorough ingredient incorporation, providing perfect, even mixing every time.
- **5-Quart Stainless Steel Bowl**: A generous bowl with a comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe convenience, this 5-quart stainless steel bowl is designed for large recipes and easy cleanup.
- **10 Speed Settings**: Whether you're whipping cream or kneading heavy dough, the 10-speed settings give you the control you need for a variety of tasks.
- **Included Accessories**: The KitchenAid 5 comes with a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield, making it ready to tackle any recipe straight out of the box.
- **Expand Your Creativity**: With over 10 optional hub-powered attachments sold separately, you can transform your stand mixer into a culinary center, from pasta makers to food grinders and more.
- **Durable Metal Construction**: Built to last, the metal construction ensures stability and durability for years of reliable mixing.

**Model Details:**
- Model: KSM150PS
- Construction: Metal
- Design: Tilt-head for easy access
- Bowl: 5 Quart Stainless Steel with a comfortable handle
- Speeds: 10 settings for versatility
- Includes: 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl, Coated Flat Beater, Coated Dough Hook, 6-Wire Whip, Pouring Shield

Whether you're a baking novice or a seasoned pro, the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is the perfect addition to your kitchen arsenal. Get ready to be inspired and create delectable treats for your friends and family with this exceptional appliance.

Introducing the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer – Your Ultimate Kitchen Companion!

Unleash your culinary creativity with the KitchenAid 5, a versatile and powerful stand mixer designed for the passionate home chef. This robust kitchen essential comes in a dazzling array of more than 20 color variants to complement your kitchen decor and personal style.

**Key Features:**

- **Generous Capacity:** Effortlessly handle up to 9 dozen cookies or 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, thanks to its spacious 5-quart stainless steel bowl. Each cookie dough batch can accommodate 28g per cookie, ensuring consistent size and quality for your treats.
- **Exceptional Mixing:** Experience thorough and efficient mixing with the 59 touch points planetary mixing action, guaranteeing quicker and more even incorporation of your ingredients.
- **Durable Construction:** Crafted from robust metal, the KitchenAid 5 is built to last, handling frequent use and heavy mixtures with ease.
- **Tilt-Head Design:** The convenient tilt-head design allows for easy access to the bowl and attached accessories, simplifying the process of adding ingredients or changing attachments.
- **Customizable Speed:** With 10 speed settings, you have complete control over the mixing process, whether you're folding delicate ingredients or kneading tough dough.
- **Versatile Attachments:** The model includes a 5-quart stainless steel bowl with a comfortable handle and is dishwasher safe for easy cleanup. You'll also receive a coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield to make every task simpler.
- **Expandable Options:** Personalize your KitchenAid 5 with over 10 optional hub-powered attachments (sold separately), transforming it into a culinary center that can grind, pasta roll, shred, and more.

Whether you're a baking enthusiast or a seasoned cook, the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer is the perfect addition to your kitchen arsenal. Its model number, KSM150PS, stands for quality and performance that KitchenAid users have come to love and trust.

Don't wait any longer to elevate your baking and cooking experience. Order your KitchenAid 5 today and make every meal a masterpiece!

**Unleash Your Culinary Creativity with the KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer**

Transform your kitchen into a professional bakery with the iconic KitchenAid 5 Stand Mixer. This exceptional appliance is designed for the passionate home chef who demands perfection and versatility in every culinary creation.

**Product Features:**

- **Vibrant Color Selection**: Choose from more than 20 stunning color variants to match your kitchen décor and express your personal style.
  
- **Powerful Capacity**: Effortlessly mix up to 9 dozen cookies or knead dough for 4 loaves of bread in a single batch, thanks to the generous 5-quart stainless steel bowl with a comfortable handle and dishwasher-safe convenience.
  
- **59-Point Planetary Mixing Action**: Achieve thorough ingredient incorporation with the KitchenAid 5's efficient 59 touch points around the bowl, ensuring every bit of batter is perfectly blended.
  
- **Tilt-Head Design**: The practical tilt-head design allows for easy access to the bowl and attached beater or accessory, so you can add ingredients for a recipe with simplicity and speed.
  
- **Customizable Speed Control**: With 10 speed settings, you can whip, knead, and stir at the precise speed required for your recipe, providing you with ultimate control and perfect results.
  
- **Durable Metal Construction**: Built to last, the robust metal construction of the mixer can handle the toughest doughs and most persistent mixing tasks.
  
- **Included Accessories**: Your KitchenAid 5 comes with a 5-quart stainless steel bowl, coated flat beater, coated dough hook, 6-wire whip, and pouring shield to kickstart your culinary adventures.
  
- **Expand Your Culinary Arsenal**: With over 10 optional hub-powered attachments (sold separately), you can transform your mixer into a culinary center. From pasta makers to food grinders, the possibilities are endless.
  
- **Model Details**: The KitchenAid 5 (model KSM150PS) embodies excellence in design, functionality, and innovation.

**In the Box:**

- 1 x 5 Quart Stainless Steel Bowl
- 1 x Coated Flat Beater
- 1 x Coated Dough Hook
- 1 x 6-Wire Whip
- 1 x Pouring Shield

**Product Features:**

- **Generous Capacity:** Easily handle large batches with the capacity to mix 9 dozen cookies, 4 loaves of bread, or whip up enough cookie dough for 28g cookies per batch.

- **Coated Flat Beater:** Ideal for quickly and thoroughly mashing potatoes or mixing cake batter.
- **Coated Dough Hook:** Designed for kneading yeast dough with ease, saving you time and effort.
- **6-Wire Whip:** Incorporates the maximum amount of air in whipped mixtures for fluffier whipped cream and angel food cakes.
- **Pouring Shield:** Prevents splatter and makes adding ingredients easy and mess-free.

- Design: Tilt-Head
- Speeds: 10
